sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-gallery', templateUrl: './gallery.component.html', styleUrls: ['./gallery.component.scss'] }) export class GalleryComponent implements OnInit { pictures: string[] = []; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { this.pictures = new Array(5).fill(0).map(this.generateImage); } generateImage() { return `https://picsum.photos/200/200?ts${Math.random()*30 + 1}`; } }
